TextLibrary.Text: You have failed to defeat the Necromancer. You must try again.
You have defeated one of Lord Bane's Generals. When all three are done, the way to Lord Bane's citadel will be clear.
You have cleared the way to Lord Bane's citadel.
You must travel into the Realms of Death, find Lord Bane's three Generals, and defeat them.
You must continue battling Lord Bane's Generals - the three Necromancers, until they have all been defeated.
